title: Goo'dahm. THe GUardian of the Obelisk
body:
Goo'dahm is not a being of this existence, in fact, the sole purpose of his existence is to protect his Obelisk.
The duo are from another plane, somewhere we cannot access.
Goo'dahm is here to safeguard his terrifyingly, slow moving, Obelisk through the land of Runeterra.
He is here to fight anyone who dares come close to his Obelisk.
The obelisk, though non-living, seem to offer the same.........

Stats: 

Hp 465 +55 1.9/5sec + 1.7
MP 195 + 85  3.4/5sec + 1.9
AD 35 +3.1
Atk speed 0.579 + 0.011
Armour 18 +1.5
MR 21 + 1.5
Speed 300


Passive: Guardian Obelisk
Goo'dahm has a floating, invulnerable obelisk above his head that follows him around, moving past terrain at 75+ lvl x 10speed. 
Within 350/400/450/500range of the Obelisk, Goo'dahm gains massive stat boosts. 
Gains:
- level x 45 bonus hp
- lvl x 2 hp regen per 5 sec, 
- lvl x 4 ad, 
- lvl x 4 armour and mr. 
- lvl x 5% attack speed
- lvl x 5 speed to both the obelisk and Gundam, 
- lvl x 1% lifesteal
- 10% CDR 
- buffs to his abilities.

Bonus speed given to Goo'dahm is also given to the Obelisk.





Q- Punishing Blow. 60/70/80/90/100 MP   18/17/16/15/14 seconds.

Normal- Goo'dahm fires an orb of fire towards the target location, dealing 30/50/80/120/170 True Damage to the first unit hit.
This damage increases by 100% for every 10 % of their max HP missing.  
Decreases their BONUS Resistances by 20/30/40/50/60% for 6 seconds.
On minions this damage is increased to 75/125/200/300/425 TD. 
Increases by 100% for every 10% of Minion hp missing.

Max of 300/500/800/1200/1700 true damage to monsters and Champions.
No Max damage to minions.

 
Near Obelisk- The Obelisk fires a continuous ray that deals 30/50/80/120/170+30/340/50/60/70%AD and
1/2/3/4/5% Max HP physical damage per second for up to 5 seconds as long as they are within Obelisk range. 
This applies a stacking slow that increases by 5/6/7/8/9% per second hit. 
Damage dealt to champions is converted to mana for 20% of what is dealt and given to Goo'dahm


Max damage per tick to monsters is 55/110/165/220/275 Damage per second.





W- Guardian ( Both effects only prevail under the Obelisk)
Cost 25 mp to activate


Passive- Under Obelisk.

Instantaneous damage more than 12% MAX HP is reduced by 30/40/50/60/70%.


Active: 
when below the Obelisk, Goo'dahm can activate to drain 12/26/40/54/68 MP per second to reduce damage taken by 15/20/25/30/35%. 
The mana drained is also simultaneously converted into health over 3 seconds.




E- Null Shackles. 30/50/70/90/110MP 26/25/24/23/22 seconds.

Normal- Goo'dahm fires out magical shackles towards an enemy, 
dealing no damage but applying 40/50/60/70/80% slow for 3 seconds and a Silence for 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds.


Near Obelisk- The Obelisk showers the zone beneath it with Null Magic, all units within the Obelisk area takes 100/250/400/550/700 + 125% AP Magic damage over 10 seconds.

In the zone the enemies lose 10/15/20/25/30 % attack and movement speed and are silenced.

Cool down starts after effect. 



R- Obelisk, Redeem Me! 100MP 120/100/80 seconds.

Passive:  When ability is available, and Obelisk is on top of Goo'dahm, Taking damage grants him .25/.5/.75 second Invulnerability and his next movement command will be a dash within 350 units.

15 second cooldown.


Activate to instantly teleport the Obelisk on top of Goo'dahm, Granting him immunity to Magical Damage for 3/5/7 seconds.

This also recovers him 50/75/100% Max HP over 50/75/100 seconds.
